title: Hey Sivir, can you pass the salt?

replies.body:
{{champion:89}} : Hey, Caitlynn, can you pass the salt?
{{champion:51}} : OMFG THIS #### LEONA DOESNT WARD KS ME A #### MILLION TIMES IM ONLY FEEDING CUZ SHACO IS #### CAMPING Y NO PEEL ##### TAEM 2 #### HEAVY IM GET DDOSED ENEMY HAX SCRIPTERS TRYHARD NOLIFERS...

I guess Leona wanted some REALLY salty salt...

That was bad... I make my leave now...

https://media.giphy.com/media/4pMX5rJ4PYAEM/giphy.gif

Could have been worse.
Could have asked {{champion:67}}

Oh yeah... Forgot about those Vayne "Mains (because I watched Gosu play them and now i think im godly at her too)", now THAT could have been some serious salt...

FYI: I only know about Gosu by word of mouth of him being one of the (if not) top Vayne players. Never watched one of his streams or anything.

He's ridiculous mechanically, to the point that he gets away with some stupid shit.

However most of his drooling fanbase don't have his clutch mechanics and can't compensate for bad descisions like he can.

But since gosu can do it, they must be able to? If it doesn't work it must be someone else's fault cause I watched gosh abuse stealth to 1v3 so obviously I can towerdive the 6/0 jinx because I know how to ult and tumble in the same frame.

Could be even worse. 

Could have asked Pulsefire Ezreal.

> [{quoted}](name=Hemulen Magi,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=RBtpWukF,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-11-10T04:51:57.018+0000)
>
> {{champion:89}} : Hey, Caitlynn, can you pass the salt?
> {{champion:51}} : OMFG THIS #### LEONA DOESNT WARD KS ME A #### MILLION TIMES IM ONLY FEEDING CUZ SHACO IS #### CAMPING Y NO PEEL ##### TAEM 2 #### HEAVY IM GET DDOSED ENEMY HAX SCRIPTERS TRYHARD NOLIFERS...

http://orig14.deviantart.net/808e/f/2015/271/6/4/mlg_leona_sticker_by_k4shike-d9b8ft2.png

{{champion:81}} Hey Sona, can you pass the salt?
{{champion:37}} ...
{{champion:81}} Oh, right.

{{champion:268}} "I told you guys, she really is my daughter!!!!" "SHURIMA LIVES IN HER BLOOD!" 
{{champion:75}} {{champion:58}} {{champion:101}} "......"
You are starting to boar me {{champion:113}}

So our Graves is being sworn at by the enemy team, and he goes...
(Insert_Name) [Graves]: /all Hey guys, why the salt?
To which I go...
Irongolem132639 [Blitzcrank] /all Because Graves is 'peppering' you guys with bullets!
DAD JOKE CONFIRMED

Had to login just to upvote this masterpiece.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
